brief_title: A Study With LY293111, Gemcitabine and Placebo in Patients With Pancreatic Cancer
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness and side effects of LY293111 given in combination with gemcitabine in patients with pancreatic cancer.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Adenocarcinoma of the pancreas that is locally advanced or metastatic and not amenable to resection with curative intent - Tumor that can be measured by x-ray or scan - Adequate organ function Exclusion Criteria: - Inability to swallow capsules - Documented brain metastases - Prior chemotherapy or biological therapy for this disease
